snippet: Little-known and long out of print, the children’s book “Your Police” was discovered by William J. Bratton in a library when he was a boy.
abstract: Unexpected star at news conference announcing that William J Bratton would be New York's next police commissioner is faded yellow copy of children’s picture book Your Police; little-known and long out of print book, read by Bratton when he was a boy, has become a talisman that he faithfully brings with him to every police department he has ever worked for.

byline.original: By JULIE BOSMAN and MARC SANTORA

lead_paragraph: Little-known and long out of print, the children’s book “Your Police” was discovered by William J. Bratton in a library when he was a boy.

headline.main: Picture Book Will Preside With Bratton
headline.print_headline: Picture Book Will Preside With Bratton
